entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_39_galvain_tark.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_43: Are you going into that bunker? If so, I need your help. They took my best racing durnis. All three of them. Do you know how hard it is to train a racing durni? Well, to be honest, it's not really all that difficult. But still, those were mine! I spent years training them. Could you get them back for me?
entries.s_46: Thank you. They'll be in small cages. Hopefully, they haven't been harmed.
entries.s_47: I understand. I should not have asked.
entries.s_48: You found them! Oh, it's so good to have them back. Don't worry, guys, we'll start training again right away!
entries.s_49: They'll be in small cages somewhere in the bunker.
